name: Hold It!
description:
This game is made in 48 hours for the ludum dare game jam.

controls:

movement: wasd or left controller stick.

Use: E on keyboard. X or A for controller.

All donations will go to Ukraine (save the children):

https://www.savethechildren.org/us/where-we-work/ukraine

Mac and Linux versions will come tomorrow if I don't forget.

Please notify me of any bugs, so that I can fix them for you!
